title: Kid and Family TV Shows in 2025: New Series & Season Premiere Dates (Updating)
description: Family-friendly TV show premiere dates will be added to the list as they're announced.
author: Ashley Iasimone
excerpt: Kid and family TV shows in 2025: Here's a calendar of family-friendly TV show premiere dates for the year, updated as announcements are made.
text: Family-friendly TV show premiere dates will be added to the list as they're announced. 'Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man' on Disney+ Courtesy Photo If you’re looking for new family TV shows to watch with your kids, or searching for the 2025 premiere date for the next season of your family’s favorite series, consider this Billboard Family calendar your go-to guide. It’s a handy roundup of new TV series premiere dates, and season premiere dates for returning shows, for the kid and family audience in 2025. The list consists of of programs rated TV-Y, TV-Y7, TV-G, and TV-PG, or expected to be suitable for most ages to watch together as a family. If you’re a parent and unsure whether a TV show is appropriate for your child, consider watching the trailer below and previewing the first episode yourself before turning it into a family activity. This family-centered release calendar is so far heavy on animated television series, like the January debut of Marvel’s Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, and the February premiere of Pixar’s Win or Lose, both streaming on Disney+. The longest-running series here: Sesame Street, returning for a 55th season and never going out of style. Expected 2025 TV show premieres that do not yet have a confirmed date include animated Hotel Transylvania spinoff Motel Transylvania — in which Drac & Mavis launch a resort for humans and monsters in the California desert — on Netflix, and the second season of Percy Jackson and the Olympians, the live-action series based on author Rick Riordan’s books, on Disney+. Save this page to keep up-to-date with Billboard Family‘s calendar of 2025 TV show premiere dates for kids and families. It will be updated regularly. January Jan. 2 Isadora Moon, new (Max) Jan. 4 Craig of the Creek, season 6 (Cartoon Network) Jan. 6 Kids Baking Championship, season 13 (Food Network) Jan. 11 StuGo, new (Disney Channel) Jan. 16 Sesame Street, season 55 (Max) Jan. 17 RoboGobo, new (Disney Jr.) Jan. 22 The Thundermans: Undercover, new (Nickelodeon) Jan. 22 Eva the Owlet, season 2 (Apple TV+) Jan. 27 Ms. Rachel, new (Netflix) Jan. 29 Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, new (Disney+) February Feb. 7 Pokémon Horizons, season 2 (Netflix) Feb. 13 Dog Days Out, new (Netflix) Feb. 15 Goldie, new (Apple TV+) Feb. 17 Gabby’s Dollhouse, season 11 (Netflix) Feb. 19 Win or Lose, new (Disney+) March March 3 Skillsville, new (PBS Kids) March 6 Dylan’s Playtime Adventures, new (Max) March 17 CoComelon Lane, season 4 (Netflix) March 21 BE@RBRICK, new (Apple TV+) April April 6 Iyanu, new (Cartoon Network) April 18 Jane, season 3 (Apple TV+) April 19 Super Duper Bunny League, new (Nickelodeon; also on Nick Jr. YouTube channel) April 30 Asterix & Obelix: The Big Fight, new (Netflix) July July 7 Weather Hunters (PBS Kids) Also Expected in 2025 Motel Transylvania, new (Netflix) My Melody & Kuromi, new (Netflix) Percy Jackson and the Olympians, season 2 (Disney+) Phoebe & Jay, new (PBS Kids) Pokémon Concierge, new (Netflix) The Patrick Star Show, season 4 (Nickelodeon) Wylde Pack, new (Nickelodeon) Get weekly rundowns straight to your inbox Sign Up
html:
Family-friendly TV show premiere dates will be added to the list as they're announced.

If you’re looking for new family TV shows to watch with your kids, or searching for the 2025 premiere date for the next season of your family’s favorite series, consider this Billboard Family calendar your go-to guide.

It’s a handy roundup of new TV series premiere dates, and season premiere dates for returning shows, for the kid and family audience in 2025. The list consists of of programs rated TV-Y, TV-Y7, TV-G, and TV-PG, or expected to be suitable for most ages to watch together as a family. If you’re a parent and unsure whether a TV show is appropriate for your child, consider watching the trailer below and previewing the first episode yourself before turning it into a family activity.

This family-centered release calendar is so far heavy on animated television series, like the January debut of Marvel’s Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, and the February premiere of Pixar’s Win or Lose, both streaming on Disney+. The longest-running series here: Sesame Street, returning for a 55th season and never going out of style.

Expected 2025 TV show premieres that do not yet have a confirmed date include animated Hotel Transylvania spinoff Motel Transylvania — in which Drac & Mavis launch a resort for humans and monsters in the California desert — on Netflix, and the second season of Percy Jackson and the Olympians, the live-action series based on author Rick Riordan’s books, on Disney+.

Save this page to keep up-to-date with Billboard Family‘s calendar of 2025 TV show premiere dates for kids and families. It will be updated regularly.

  • January

    Jan. 2

    • Isadora Moon, new (Max)

    Jan. 4

    Jan. 6

    Jan. 16

    Jan. 17

    • RoboGobo, new (Disney Jr.)

    Jan. 22

    Jan. 22

    • Eva the Owlet, season 2 (Apple TV+)

    Jan. 27

    Jan. 29

  • February

    Feb. 19

  • March

    March 6

    Dylan’s Playtime Adventures, new (Max)

    March 17

    March 21

  • April

    April 18

    Super Duper Bunny League, new (Nickelodeon; also on Nick Jr. YouTube channel)

    April 30

    Asterix & Obelix: The Big Fight, new (Netflix)

  • July

    • Weather Hunters (PBS Kids)

  • Also Expected in 2025

    • Motel Transylvania, new (Netflix)
    • My Melody & Kuromi, new (Netflix)
    • Percy Jackson and the Olympians, season 2 (Disney+)
    • Phoebe & Jay, new (PBS Kids)
    • Pokémon Concierge, new (Netflix)
    • The Patrick Star Show, season 4 (Nickelodeon)
    • Wylde Pack, new (Nickelodeon)
